questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Objects and surroundings

Where was the photo taken?
A) In a city park
B) At the beach
C) Inside a museum
D) On a sidewalk

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A building
C) A glove
D) An animal

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A flower
B) A glove
C) A bicycle
D) A person

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A river
B) Grass and leaves
C) A playground
D) A car

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A bench
B) A sidewalk
C) A streetlight
D) A fence

What color is the glove in the photo?
A) Blue
B) Green
C) Red
D) Orange

What type of surface is the glove lying on?
A) Sand
B) Grass
C) Water
D) Wood

What is next to the glove in the photo?
A) A tree
B) A flower
C) A sidewalk
D) A bicycle

How is the glove positioned in the photo?
A) Hanging on a tree
B) Floating in water
C) Lying on the ground
D) Sitting on a bench

What is the condition of the glove?
A) New
B) Worn out
C) Torn
D) Wet

What is the texture of the surface the glove is on?
A) Smooth
B) Rough
C) Wet
D) Shiny

What is the dominant color in the photo?
A) Green
B) Blue
C) Yellow
D) Red

What is the state of the grass in the photo?
A) Dry
B) Wet
C) Overgrown
D) Trimmed

What is the edge of the sidewalk like?
A) Curved
B) Straight
C) Broken
D) Painted

What is the condition of the leaves around the glove?
A) Fresh
B) Fallen
C) Growing
D) Colored

What is the color of the sidewalk?
A) Black
B) Gray
C) White
D) Brown

What does the glove's color contrast with?
A) The sky
B) The grass
C) The sidewalk
D) The leaves

What might be the material of the glove?
A) Leather
B) Rubber
C) Cotton
D) Plastic

What part of the glove is most visible?
A) The fingers
B) The palm and fingers
C) The wrist
D) The back

What is the angle of the photo?
A) Top-down
B) Side view
C) Front view
D) Back view

What is the state of the ground around the glove?
A) Clean
B) Littered
C) Wet
D) Dry

What is the photo's composition focused on?
A) Symmetry
B) Contrast
C) Harmony
D) Texture

What is the photo's primary subject?
A) Nature
B) An object
C) A person
D) An animal

What element is most dominant in the background?
A) Trees
B) Grass
C) Buildings
D) Water

What is the glove's orientation?
A) Palm up
B) Palm down
C) Sideways
D) Upright
